discussion.author: fredrikekre
discussion.text:
Perhaps this should be GCP.jl see https://julialang.github.io/Pkg.jl/v1/creating-packages/#Package-naming-guidelines-1

Also, please add some compatibility, at least on Julia, see https://julialang.github.io/Pkg.jl/v1/compatibility/

discussion.author: rana
discussion.text:
I will rename the repo to GCP.jl and add [compat]. 
Renaming will require deleting and recreating the repo.
You may close this request. 
I will submit a new Registrator request.
Thank you for the guidance.

discussion.author: rana
discussion.text:
Please close this request.

A replacement request was made at https://github.com/JuliaRegistries/General/pull/278

discussion.author: StefanKarpinski
discussion.text:
